Explore o AngularPay, um projeto inovado: Explore AngularPay, an innovative project that aims to simulate sending money between users via credit card. Browse the list of users on the first screen, choose a recipient and start the payment process. An intuitive modal presents recipient information, credit card options, and a button to make payment. Completing the form, the user triggers a payment endpoint that determines the success or failure of the transaction, displaying a corresponding modal. A simple and efficient experience to simulate financial transfers! üí∏üåê
